backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report listing three feature specs with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the Valentine-themed title and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling navigation between pages and controlling background music with a fixed footer.
Audio controller component handling playback, mute toggling, autoplay behavior, and UI button.
frontend/src/components/ConfettiBurst.ts: Generates 100 confetti and heart particles with physics updates and auto‑clears after 4 seconds.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Renders 25 randomly placed floating heart icons for background ambience.
frontend/src/components/Reasons/ReasonCa: Flip‑card component showing front and back content with heart micro‑animations on interaction.
frontend/src/content/reasons.ts: Exports an array of 8 predefined romantic messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveButton.ts: Hook implementing an evasive button with movement, shrinking, and rotating messages based on interaction attempts.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, custom color variables, fonts, animations, and utility classes for the romantic-themed UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/FinalLoveNotePage.tsx: Displays the final love note with heart animations and a restart button.
frontend/src/pages/HeroPage.tsx: Shows the introductory hero screen with floating hearts and a start button.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalPage.tsx: Renders the proposal interaction with evasive 'No' button logic, confetti, and a continuation flow.
frontend/src/pages/ReasonsPage.tsx: Lists reasons in a grid with navigation buttons for moving back or forward in the flow.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and extended theme settings for the romantic UI.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state for a multi-page romantic Valentine’s website with themed visuals, animations, and interactive behaviors. Lists existing features, requirements, and architectural notes for implementing the proposal experience.
